## Parameters
Here we will define and load objects and functions that will be used throughout the document.
```{r}
# Paths
path_r_tables <- here::here("04_GEX_analysis/3_cell_composition/results/tables")
path_r_figs <- here::here("04_GEX_analysis/3_cell_composition/results/figs")

# Functions
source(here::here("bin/utils.R"))

# Parameters
comparison_name_list <- c("Fixed-Fresh", "Fixed-C", "FC-C", "FC-Fixed"
                          )
comparison_info_list <- c("HumanColon: Fixed vs Fresh", "HumanColon: Fixed vs Cryo","HumanColon: Fixed+Cryo vs Cryo",  "HumanColon: Fixed+Cryo vs Fixed"
                            )
comparison_label_list <- c("Fixed vs Fresh", "Fixed vs Cryo","Fixed+Cryo vs Cryo",  "Fixed+Cryo vs Fixed"
                            )
```


## Load data
The data used in this Rmarkdown document comes from **SCTEST_33** dataset.
```{r}
sccoda_effect_df_list <- purrr::map2(comparison_name_list, 
                                     comparison_info_list, 
                                     function(comparison_name, comparison_info){
  file_path <- paste0(path_r_tables, "/HumanColon_scCODA_", comparison_name, "_effect.tsv")
  df <- read.csv(file = file_path, 
                 sep = "\t")
  df["comparison_name"] <- comparison_name
  df["comparison_fraction"] <- sapply(strsplit(comparison_info, ": "), `[`, 1)
  df["comparison_label"] <- sapply(strsplit(comparison_info, ": "), `[`, 2)
  df["credible_effects"] <- ifelse(df$Final.Parameter == 0, "False", "True")
  df
})

sccoda_effect_global_df <- do.call("rbind", sccoda_effect_df_list)

# Lock plot order making a factor level order
cells_order <- c("CD4+ T cells", "CD8+ T cells", "NK cells", "M0 macrophages", "M1 macrophages", 
                                               "B cells", "B cells cycling", "Plasma cells", "Plasmablasts", "Mast cells",
                                                "Colonocytes 1", "Colonocytes 2", "Colonocytes PLCG2+", "Intestinal BEST4+OTOP2+ cells",
                                               "Transit-amplifying (TA) cells cycling", "Mature Goblet", "Tuft cells", 
                                               "Endothelium", "Myofibroblasts", "Stromal cells", "Glia", "Cycling cells")
sccoda_effect_global_df$Cell.Type <- factor(sccoda_effect_global_df$Cell.Type, 
                                                   levels = rev(cells_order))
sccoda_effect_global_df$comparison_label <- factor(sccoda_effect_global_df$comparison_label, 
                                                   levels = comparison_label_list)
```


# Dotplot immune
```{r fig.height=5, fig.width=8}
gg_dotplot_effect_glob <- sccoda_effect_global_df %>%
  filter(comparison_fraction == "HumanColon") %>% 
    ggplot(aes(
      x = Cell.Type, 
      y = comparison_label,
      color = log2.fold.change, 
      size = credible_effects)) + 
    geom_point() + 
    scale_color_gradient2(low="#4575b4", mid="#ffffbf", high="#d73027") + # , limits = c(-1,1),
    cowplot::theme_cowplot() + 
    labs(title = "scCODA: HumanColon",
         color = "Log2FC",
         size = "Credible effects") + 
    theme(axis.ticks = element_blank(),
          axis.title = element_blank(),
          axis.line  = element_blank(),
          axis.text.x = element_text(angle = 90, vjust = 0.5, hjust=1),
          #legend.position = "bottom",
          legend.text = element_text(size=10))

gg_dotplot_effect_glob

fig_path <- paste0(path_r_figs, "/HumanColon_scCODA_dotplot_celltype.png")
ggsave(filename = fig_path, 
       plot = gg_dotplot_effect_glob)
```
